summary: A couple's attitudes are challenged when their daughter introduces them to her African-American fiancé.
cast: Spencer Tracy|Sidney Poitier|Katharine Hepburn|Katharine Houghton|Cecil Kellaway|Beah Richards|Roy Glenn|Isabel Sanford|Virginia Christine|Alexandra Hay|Barbara Randolph|D'Urville Martin|Tom Heaton|Grace Gaynor|Skip Martin|John Hudkins|Natalie Core|Jacqueline Fontaine|Timothy Scott|Yuki Tani|June Whitley Taylor
title: Adivina quién viene esta noche
